title: specification of thermal properties on components

junctionTemperature.description: recommended operating junction temperature range of a part

junctionTemperatureMax.description: absolute maximum junction temperature range of a part

ambientTemperature.description: recommended operating ambient air temperature range of a part

ambientTemperatureMax.description: absolute maximum ambient air temperature range under which a part operates

caseTemperature.description: case temperature range of a part

caseTemperatureMax.description: absolute maximum case temperature range of a part

leadTemperatureMax.description: absolute maximum lead temperature of a part

storageTemperatureMax.description: absolute maximum storage temperature range of a part

packageThermalResistance.description: package thermal resistance of a part

thermalResistanceJunctionToAmbient.description: thermal resistance between the semiconductor junction of a part and the ambient air

thermalResistanceJunctionToCase.description: thermal resistance between the semiconductor junction and the package surface of a part

thermalResistanceJunctionToboard.description: thermal resistance between the semiconduction junction of a part and the board

thermalResistanceJunctionToLead.description: thermal resistance between the semiconduction junction of a part and the solder pad

thermalResistanceCaseToAmbient.description: thermal resistance between the package surface of a part and the ambient air
